long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimalist ToDo list. An efficient way to manage your to-do list directly from your browser's new tab page. Its focus is on simplicity, allowing users to easily add, complete, and archive tasks without distractions. 

A simple and clean interface for managing your pending tasks and remembre them each time you open a tab.
